config.script:
root = self.getChild("root")
	emvActivityRange = root.getChild("emvActivityRange")
	emvCheckIO = root.getChild("emvCheckIO")

	#emvActivityRange.props.params.selection = None
	#emvCheckIO.props.params.selection = None
	
	emvActivityRange.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvCheckIO.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False

try:
		#system.perspective.print(('page:',self.page.props.primaryView)) #items()))
		#system.perspective.print(('session:',self.session.props.items()))

		root = self.getChild("root")
		emvActivityRange = root.getChild("emvActivityRange")
		emvCheckIO = root.getChild("emvCheckIO")		
		emvActivityRange.props.params.selectionIn = None
#		emvCheckIO.props.params.selection = None
		
		#My way to check if script is executed in designer on Apply/Ok button click (not browser).		
		if self.page.props.primaryView is None:

			emvActivityRange.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
			emvCheckIO.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False	
			
		else:
			midnight = system.date.midnight(system.date.now())
#			dateFrom = system.date.addYears(midnight, -1)
#			dateFrom = system.date.addDays(midnight, -90)
			checkIO = 1
			
			root.setPropsDropdowns()	
			root.sendMsgCondition()
		
#			emvActivityRange.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
			#If following row is uncommented then qury will be fired 2 times
			#emvCheckIO.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
		
		
	except:
		import traceback
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Events")
		msg = self.name + ':\n'
		msg += traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

customMethods.name: setOptions
customMethods.script:
midnight = system.date.midnight(system.date.now())
	nintyDaysValue = system.date.addDays(midnight,-90)
	lstDateFrom = 	[
	['Yesterday', 'Yesterday'],
	['7 Days', '7 Days'],
	['14 Days', '14 Days'],
	['Month to Date','Month to Date'],
	['30 Days', '30 Days'],
	['60 Days', '60 Days'],
	['90 Days', '90 Days'],
	['180 Days', '180 Days'],
	['Year to Date','Year to Date'],
	['1 Year', '1 Year'],
	['2 Years', '2 Years'],
	['3 Years', '3 Years'],
	['4 Years', '4 Years'],
	['5 Years', '5 Years'],
	['All Time', 'All Time']	
	]
		
	self.props.params.options = [ dict(value = x[0],label = x[1]) for x in lstDateFrom]

	self.props.params.selectionIn = '1 Year'

customMethods.name: setOptions
customMethods.script:
query = """
SELECT [id]
  ,[name]
FROM [calendar].[calendars]
ORDER BY [name]
	"""
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[],'RITIOps')
	
	# Version 1 set options as list of dictionaries
	self.props.params.options = [ dict(value = x[0],label = x[1]) for x in result]
	
	# Version 2 set options as dataset
	#self.props.params.options = result

customMethods.name: setOptions
customMethods.script:
query = """
SELECT 
	 [name] AS [value]
	,[name] AS [label]
FROM [calendar].[CalendarEvents]
GROUP BY [name]
ORDER BY [name] 
"""
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[],'RITIOps')
	
	# Version 1 set options as list of dictionaries
	self.props.params.options = [ dict(value = x[0],label = x[1]) for x in result]
	
	# Version 2 set options as dataset
	#self.props.params.options = result

customMethods.name: setOptions
customMethods.script:
query = """
SELECT 0, 'checkout'
UNION ALL 
SELECT 1, 'checkin'
	"""
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[],'RITIOps')
	
	# Version 1 set options as list of dictionaries
	self.props.params.options = [ dict(value = x[0],label = x[1]) for x in result]
	
	# Version 2 set options as dataset
	#self.props.params.options = result
	
	self.props.params.selection = 1

config.script:
root = self.parent
	
	emvCalendarId = root.getChild("emvCalendarId")
	emvEventName = root.getChild("emvEventName")
	emvCheckIO = root.getChild("emvCheckIO")
	emvActivityRange = root.getChild("emvActivityRange")
	emvGender = root.getChild("emvGender")
	emvMinAge = root.getChild("emvMinAge")
	emvMaxAge = root.getChild("emvMaxAge")
	emvSearch = root.getChild("emvSearch")

	
	emvCalendarId.props.params.clear = True
	emvEventName.props.params.clear = True
	emvCheckIO.props.params.clear = True
#	emvActivityRange.props.params.clear = True
	emvGender.props.params.clear = True
	emvMinAge.props.params.clear = True
	emvMaxAge.props.params.clear = True
	emvSearch.props.params.clear = True
#	emvActivityRange.props.params.selectionIn = '90 Days'
	
	payload = {}
	payload['calendarId'] = None
	payload['calEventName'] = None
	payload['checkIO'] = None
	payload['activityRange'] = None
	payload['genderId'] = None
	payload['minAge'] = None
	payload['maxAge'] = None
	payload['searchText'] = None
	payload['beginDate'] = None
	payload['endDate'] = None
	system.perspective.sendMessage("clearFilter", payload={}, scope="page")

onChange.script:
emvCalendarId = self.getChild("emvCalendarId")
	emvEventName = self.getChild("emvEventName")
	emvCheckIO = self.getChild("emvCheckIO")
	emvActivityRange = self.getChild("emvActivityRange")
	emvGender = self.getChild("emvGender")
	emvMinAge = self.getChild("emvMinAge")
	emvMaxAge = self.getChild("emvMaxAge")
	emvSearch = self.getChild("emvSearch")
	
	emvCalendarId.props.params.clear = True
	emvEventName.props.params.clear = True
	emvCheckIO.props.params.clear = True
	emvActivityRange.props.params.clear = True
	emvGender.props.params.clear = True
	emvMinAge.props.params.clear = True
	emvMaxAge.props.params.clear = True
	emvSearch.props.params.clear = True

	emvCalendarId.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvEventName.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvCheckIO.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvActivityRange.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvGender.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvMinAge.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvMaxAge.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvSearch.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False	

	
	if self.custom._devClean:
		self.custom._devClean = False

emvCalendarId = self.getChild("emvCalendarId")
	emvEventName = self.getChild("emvEventName")
	emvCheckIO = self.getChild("emvCheckIO")
	emvActivityRange = self.getChild("emvActivityRange")
	emvGender = self.getChild("emvGender")
	emvMinAge = self.getChild("emvMinAge")
	emvMaxAge = self.getChild("emvMaxAge")
	emvSearch = self.getChild("emvSearch")


	
	
	if self.custom._isDev:
		if currentValue.value is True:
			self.setPropsDropdowns()
		else:
			emvCalendarId.props.params.options = False
			emvEventName.props.params.options = False
			emvCheckIO.props.params.options = False
			emvActivityRange.props.params.options = False
			emvGender.props.params.options = False
			emvMinAge.props.params.options = False
			emvMaxAge.props.params.options = False
			emvSearch.props.params.searchText = None
			
	emvCalendarId.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvEventName.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvCheckIO.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvActivityRange.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvGender.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvMinAge.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvMaxAge.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False
	emvSearch.props.params.actionPerformedPulse = False

customMethods.name: setPropsDropdowns
customMethods.script:
emvCalendarId = self.getChild("emvCalendarId")
	emvEventName = self.getChild("emvEventName")
	emvCheckIO = self.getChild("emvCheckIO")
	emvActivityRange = self.getChild("emvActivityRange")
	emvGender = self.getChild("emvGender")
	emvMinAge = self.getChild("emvMinAge")
	emvMaxAge = self.getChild("emvMaxAge")
	
	emvCalendarId.setOptions()
	emvEventName.setOptions()
	emvCheckIO.setOptions()
	emvActivityRange.setOptions()
	emvMinAge.setOptions()	
	emvMaxAge.setOptions()
	emvGender.setOptions()

customMethods.name: sendMsgCondition
customMethods.script:
emvActivityRange = self.getChild("emvActivityRange")
	emvCalendarId = self.getChild("emvCalendarId")
	emvEventName = self.getChild("emvEventName")
	emvCheckIO = self.getChild("emvCheckIO")
	emvGender = self.getChild("emvGender")
	emvMinAge = self.getChild("emvMinAge")
	emvMaxAge = self.getChild("emvMaxAge")

	emvSearch = self.getChild("emvSearch")
	#ystem.perspective.print((self.getChild("emvActivityRange").props.params.selection))
	emvDateRange = self.getChild("emvDateRange")
	
	if payload is None:
		payload = {}
		payload['calendarId'] = emvCalendarId.props.params.selection
		payload['calEventName'] = emvEventName.props.params.selection
		payload['checkIO'] = emvCheckIO.props.params.selection
		payload['activityRange'] = emvActivityRange.props.params.selection
		payload['genderId'] = emvGender.props.params.selection
		payload['minAge'] = emvMinAge.props.params.selection
		payload['maxAge'] = emvMaxAge.props.params.selection
		payload['searchText'] = emvSearch.props.params.searchText
		payload['beginDate'] = emvDateRange.props.params.BeginDate
		payload['endDate'] = emvDateRange.props.params.EndDate
	else:
		payload = {}
		
	#ystem.perspective.print(('mhByCondition',payload)) 
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('mhByCondition', payload = payload, scope="session")
#	system.perspective.sendMessage('SelectedFilters', payload = payload)
